title: 'Best mild shampoo for any hair type'
body: I have been using this product for past 4 years. Although it can't reduce Hair fall but i like it for it being mild as it cause less harm to hair compared to other harsh shampoos. Its mild fragrance is awesome and this shampoo is my first choice every time. For reducing hair fall it might alone don't work as there are other things as well which nourish the hair and reduce hair fall but because of it's mildness it can work better on hair of any type.
